citances.sentence: 2 The applicant sought leave to appeal from the reasons of Tamberlin J. That matter was heard by Gyles J on 20 December 2006 who dismissed the application: see Sheikholeslami v Brungs [2006] FCA 1781. I do not propose to set out in detail what both Tamberlin J and Gyles J said. The reader of these reasons should understand them to be given with full background of the reasons of Tamberlin J and Gyles J.

HUMAN RIGHTS AND EQUAL OPPORTUNITY COMMISSION ACT 1986 - SECT 46PR Court not bound by technicalities
